Category: Rating | Dark Matter in Cyberspace <<<<<<< HEAD 2015-06-01T12:52:39+08:00 http://leetschau.github.io/ Li Chao ======= 2015-05-26T17:50:21+08:00 http://leetschau.github.io/ Li Chao leetschau@gmail.com >>>>>>> 07ed3639e773b839d5491a4f5cd36dc20296d73c Octopress vim.org上插件评分的含义 2013-01-15T12:14:34+08:00 http://leetschau.github.io/blog/2013/01/15/121434

Rating m/n, Downloaded by k

m指总分数，n指总投票数，k是总下载数，评分有3个级别："Life Changing"4分，"Helpful"1分，"Unfulfilling"-1分，所以基本上m/n的值超过1就说明东西不错，越接近4越好。

来源：Karma on vim.org.

Karma是来自于佛教的词汇，指报应、业、因果、缘分之类的；
